product_name: Union Bindings Legacy Snowboard Bindings - Women's - 2014/2015
long_description: Stiff, responsive Legacy bindings are ideal for high-speed riders who take on steep lines and half-pipes. They offer the performance of a high-end binding with the anatomic fit of a women's model.
short_description: Stiff, responsive Legacy bindings are ideal for high-speed riders who take on steep lines and half-pipes. They offer the performance of a high-end binding with the anatomic fit of a women's model.
